backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing three updates to ServicesSection.tsx including layout, English text, and icon replacements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend React components and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file configuring root div, metadata, favicon, and loading main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the LandingPage component as the root app output.
frontend/src/components/landing/BookingS: Booking form that validates inputs and opens a prefilled WhatsApp message on submit.
frontend/src/components/landing/Coverage: Displays service coverage message with listed areas in Ahmedabad and Gandhinagar.
frontend/src/components/landing/Floating: Floating WhatsApp button linking to chat with styling and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero banner with background image, title, tagline, and WhatsApp/Call CTAs.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingF: Footer with branding, contact buttons, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingN: Sticky navigation bar with brand title, call button, and smooth-scroll Book Now link.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes all landing page sections into a full-page layout.
frontend/src/components/landing/OurWorkS: Shows two AC cleaning gallery items with images and captions in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/landing/Services: Four-card services grid using lucide-react icons, blue-accent styling, and short English descriptions.
frontend/src/components/ServiceAreasSect: Renders four service area cards in a blue-tinted grid with bilingual labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context/provider and hook for managing Internet Identity login, identity restoration, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes and service-area colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, animations, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, features, and versioning for an ICP dapp with React frontend and Motoko backend.
